Simplesmente inacreditável, um dos melhores FPS que já joguei! Um clássico e marco na história dos games, sem contar com a narrativa e capacidade de interação nos cenários que outros games da época não te permitiam! Se vale a pena? Sim! vale a pena comprar e jogar, pois trata-se de um clássico, e de um game que redefiniu os moldes até hoje.

Огромная сочная веха в жанре ФПС. МОлчаливый герой ботаник оказавшийся в неудачное время в неудачном месте. Странные оригинальные монстры. Странная история. Но почему то хочется периодически туда возвращаться

Я конечно понимаю что это инди-проект и что он создан на 20 долларов, собранных на кик стартере, но я ожидал чего-то большего чем калеку с ломом

Its currently 2022, and i dont regret buying this game! This game throughout the time is still fun and interesting to play. It helped me with an anxiety! When i played Gmod, i spawned a headcrab and was terrified of it, now that i play Half-Life, i'm not afraid of headcrabs and other creatures in the game! I definetly recommend playing this game!

今天终于把这款从小到大一直只闻其名的游戏打完了，因为懒，多以我现在都玩AVG游戏，所以去年其实我就把半条命下载了，不过新手教程都没过完我就给卸载了ヾ(ﾟ∀ﾟゞ)，上两天想着这些库存也不能一直吃灰呀。。。，所以我就又把它下了回来，坚持了一段时间，终于把他给打完了，也算是了解了我的一个心愿。
剧情很棒，考虑到他是一款98年的游戏，虽然WIN10游玩的时候偶尔会出现闪退。。但整体来看游玩过程还是很流畅的。内容方面，除了剧情，给我印象最深的就是各种各样的远程跳跃，对我个人而言应该算是高难度了，以至于我一度认为他是一款高难度跑酷游戏。。。，总之，如果你还在观望，那么我推荐你趁着打折时一起入了v社大包，绝对不亏。
最后，撬棍YYDS！！！

I think the thing I find most interesting about Half-Life is the story. This is one of the main reasons I play video games, is due to the epic storytelling involved. Half-Life is no exception, and I've found myself constantly coming back to it. It's not as glamorous or as showy as Call of Duty, or some other more popular titles. Still, I think it's Valve's baby, and always will be.
Zamanının en iyi oyunlarından hala da zevkli bir oyun

Never played? Jump in raw. Tweak some settings and appreciate this milestone in gaming history for what it is: a fun survival-horror-inspired action-adventure FPS game - a game that served as a benchmark in several different ways and spawned Counter-Strike in the form of a mod that grew to its own distinct property. 

Why are you still reading? 

Just go play this, it won't take too long, then go play Black Mesa. Alternatively, you can play the Source version - blitz through it even - and have yet another point of comparison. It's roughly a 15-20 hour game your first time through if you scour, subsequent playthroughs can be finished in a single sitting.
